channel.title: Need help making commands work
channel.description: ok i wanted to make some commands a couple of them are ::500 and ::500off gives u 500 of each lvl and infinite hp i tried adding it (found this on a topic) and i added it exactly where the guy said i tried making it work and nothing no errors it just doesnt work also a ::damageall command added it where i am supposed to also doesnt work and has no errors. i also wanted to know if there was a code that made enemies attack other enemies like in the real rs with the gnomes and khazards(my idea dont take -.-) cuz i wanted to add something fun in my server that others might enjoy like zammy mages and sara mages having a battle (just an idea) i would like to make that work also making certain items change u into a npc like the ring of visibility turns u into a ghost plz help me out you can pm me in here or just post ty!! :D :D

item.title: Need help making commands work
item.dc:creator: @Why Why...
item.description:
@Why wrote:

ok i wanted to make some commands a couple of them are ::500 and ::500off gives u 500 of each lvl and infinite hp i tried adding it (found this on a topic) and i added it exactly where the guy said i tried making it work and nothing no errors it just doesnt work also a ::damageall command added it where i am supposed to also doesnt work and has no errors. i also wanted to know if there was a code that made enemies attack other enemies like in the real rs with the gnomes and khazards(my idea dont take -.-) cuz i wanted to add something fun in my server that others might enjoy like zammy mages and sara mages having a battle (just an idea) i would like to make that work also making certain items change u into a npc like the ring of visibility turns u into a ghost plz help me out you can pm me in here or just post ty!!
